about_the_game:
You find yourself in a strange living room. A haunting and beautiful melody plays far off in the distance. It seems vaguely familiar, but - where am I? What do I do? “Reality” is a 3D mystery that implores you to search for secrets and notice details of your surroundings in a surreal and minimal dream world. It’s up to you to explore this ethereal environment, uncover abstract puzzles, and piece together the meaning behind your new reality.

• Unique FM Skyline Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a beautifully minimal world that reflects the artistic vision of FM Skyline’s music and design.

• Abstract Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that require careful thought and exploration, pushing you to uncover hidden layers of reality.

• Surreal Atmosphere: an enchanting and ethereal visual world and soundscape creates an immersive, otherworldly experience.

Discover the mystery of Reality—where sound and dreamlike visuals collide, crafted by FM Skyline and brought to life by 100% Electronica.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M

name: FM Skyline's "Reality"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: “Reality” is a 3D mystery game created by 100% Electronica, set in a world of FM Skyline’s surreal and minimalist designs brought to life. Explore an open dream world and solve abstract puzzles with only a careful eye and ear as your guide.
